timeline.message: Avoid crashing on import even if collection not found

timeline.bodyText: Are you getting the whole list as a sublist here? Why is that necessary? 🤔

replies.bodyText:
It was already doing that, 2 lines down
my goal with this change was to do nothing semantic, simply to guarantee that the returned variable was initialized prior to the directory check and that the 'Arrays.asList' (which was the crashing call) was only called when deckList was initialized
